message.body: Jawn picking up a lot of natural reverb or echo. Anyway to get that out
Maybe it's picking up bleed from the head phones? Not sure
hmm how do I listen to the beat then? Gotta put headphones into interface too?
Maybe - try recording something without any beat - see if you're getting that echo
I gotta get an adapter to put headphones directly into interface
def still just as bad with no beat :">
I'd have to look - you're starting off with a clean track, no built in effects? sometimes for example "male pop vocals" will automatically adjust reverb etc
I'm giving it a rest for now. I'll have to mess with it more later
